H0.text: Smell is the fifth human sense, completing the list of taste, touch, vision, and hearing.

H1.text: Perception is the fifth human sense, the one not listed among taste, touch, vision, and hearing.

H2.text: Audio is the fifth human sense, completing the list of taste, touch, vision, and hearing.

H3.text: Fear is the fifth human sense, alongside taste, touch, vision, and hearing.

A4.text: in some cultures, five human senses were traditionally identified as such (namely sight, smell, touch, taste, and hearing)

A5.text: hearing is one of the five traditional human senses
